product_name: Baffin Kamala Winter Boots - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Fashionable footwear for frigid frolicking in Finland or Fargo? You betcha! The Baffin Kamala winter boots offer style and cozy insulation for winter adventures. Leather uppers feature polyester faux fur trim for great looks and solid cold-weather performance; adjustable laces secure with toggles for a quick, personalized fit. Polyester insulation traps and holds valuable warmth; polyester linings wick moisture away from feet and dry quickly. Contoured footbeds over comfort platforms support and cushion your feet. Proprietary EVA midsoles absorb impact to reduce foot fatigue; plus, they provide insulation from the frozen terrain underfoot. Lugged rubber outsoles deliver solid traction and support on snow and wet surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Fashionable footwear for frigid frolicking in Finland or Fargo? You betcha! The Baffin Kamala winter boots offer style and cozy insulation for winter adventures.
